Class SessionManager

java.lang.Object
session.SessionManager
public class SessionManager extends Object
The SessionManager class handles user session management. It keeps track of the currently logged-in user and their role.

  • Method Details

    • login

      public static void login(Long userId, boolean isAdminStatus)
      Logs in a user by setting their user ID and role.
      Parameters:
      userId - The ID of the logged-in user.
      isAdminStatus - True if the user is an admin, false otherwise.

    • getLoggedInUserId

      public static Long getLoggedInUserId()
      Retrieves the ID of the logged-in user.
      Returns:
      The logged-in user ID.

    • isAdmin

      public static boolean isAdmin()
      Checks if the logged-in user is an admin.
      Returns:
      True if the user is an admin, false otherwise.

    • isUserLoggedIn

      public static boolean isUserLoggedIn()
      Checks if there is a user currently logged in.
      Returns:
      True if a user is logged in, false otherwise.

    • logout

      public static void logout()
      Logs out the current user by resetting session values.
